short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects and reveals Dampnuts in your browsing experience. Credit goes to: @realLordDampnut (OG) and @colinmochrie.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uses an interval function to check & replace the following words in your browser:

Donald Trump → Lord Dampnut
DonaldTrump → LordDampnut
Donald John Trump → Lord Dampnut
Donald J. Trump → Lord Dampnut
Trump → Dampnut

...providing a more true-to-form experience for all!
